page.title: 18MINEHEAD BOOKSHOPS
page.content: These shops sell books: W.H.Smith,The Avenue Post Office,Newshop,Alcombe News,Alcombe Bookshop,N.S.S.Woolworths. All the shops sell new books except Alcombe Bookshop which sells second-hand books.People bring old books to this shop to sell or the shopkeeper buys books at auction sales. They cost from 5p to Â£60.New books cost from 25p.Shops get books from warehouses in Weston-Super-Mare,Swindon,Dulverton and Cornwall. Novels and books about Exmoor are the most popular.Most books are bought by adults.All the shops are open from Monday until Saturday.The Avenue Post Office is open all Sunday.Newshop and Alcombe News are open Sunday mornings.
